pr_title: Allow building of aarch64 for all current releases

timeline.message:
Allow building of aarch64 for all current releases

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Please update the comments on lines 45-46 to match.
timeline.author: keithc-ca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -125,9 +125,9 @@ SPECS = ['ppc64_aix' : CURRENT_RELEASES,
          'x86-64_windows_cm': CURRENT_RELEASES,
          'x86-64_windows_xl' : CURRENT_RELEASES,
          'x86-64_windows_xl_cm': CURRENT_RELEASES,
-         'aarch64_linux' : ['8', '11'],
+         'aarch64_linux' : CURRENT_RELEASES,

timeline.message:
Allow building of aarch64 for all current releases

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: The osx platforms are x86-64_mac and x86-64_mac_cmprssptrs; there's no alias by these names either.
timeline.author: keithc-ca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,10 +40,10 @@
  *              win_x86-64_cmprssptrs,
  *              win_x86 (Java 8 support only),
  *              zos_390-64_cmprssptrs (Java 11 support only),
- *              osx_x86-64 (Java 8 and Java 11 support only),
- *              osx_x86-64_cmprssptrs (Java 8 and Java 11 support only),
- *              aarch64_linux (Java 8 and Java 11 support only),
- *              aarch64_linux_xl (Java 8 and Java 11 support only)
+ *              osx_x86-64,
+ *              osx_x86-64_cmprssptrs,

replies.bodyText: Updated to be the same as #10615
replies.author: pshipton
